tasks.task: First, I need to think about the main task here, which is planting and maintaining the three sisters. That would be the main maintenance tasks related to the garden. So, MAINTASK would be "Planting three sisters crops" or "Maintaining a three sisters garden." Then the subtasks would break down the actual actions involved.
